abstract: I have learned one important lesson of entrepreneurship: just because you can doesn't mean you should.
snippet: I have learned one important lesson of entrepreneurship: just because you can doesn't mean you should.
lead_paragraph: I was fascinated by the recent case study in The Times about a Seattle-based retailer that decided to open a location on the other side of the country. The piece hit home with me because we've often had similar conversations here.
